title: Ticket #925: Log reading code should handle any partial event
description: The log reading code tries to handle partial events, but depending on where the break in the event is, the code may fail. (Matt wants to get rid of the no-NFS-log files default for DAGMan jobs, and fixing this would be part of the solution for allowing log files on NFS.)
remarks:
2010-Jun-21 11:40:30 by tannenba:
When this ticket is resolved, the quick-n-dirty work around patch in #1457 should probably be reverted.
